thread.title: Ground News - A Romanian student helps, along with colleagues, a poor kindergarten in South Africa that was robbed

author: Adevarul
title: Ground News - A Romanian student helps, along with colleagues, a poor kindergarten in South Africa that was robbed
text:
Summary by Adevarul Originally from the Argeș commune of Corbi and a second-year student in Bucharest in the only entrepreneurship faculty in Romania, Ana Baciu became involved with several colleagues in supporting a poor kindergarten in South Africa , being impressed by the children there.
